game.title: Echoes of Eternity
game.synopsis: In a world where time is broken, the fabric of reality is unraveling. Players take on the role of a Chronokeeper, tasked with repairing the timestream and saving humanity from extinction.
game.beginning: The game begins in a desolate future where the last remnants of humanity are struggling to survive. The player's character awakens with no memory of who they are or how they got there. As they explore the ruins of civilization, they discover a mysterious artifact that allows them to manipulate time.
game.ending: After navigating through various timelines and eras, the player finally discovers the source of the timestream's corruption: an ancient entity known as the Time Reaver. In a climactic battle, the player must use their mastery of time to defeat the Time Reaver and restore the original timeline, ensuring humanity's survival.
